@@ -119,0 +124,6 @@
+    /* Simplifies lambda expressions when setting AttributeInfo */

+        return t.write(DerValue.tag_Set, r.toByteArray());
+    }
+
+    /* Set AttributeInfo for supported PKCS9 attributes */
